Name: ventilation of dwellings, decentralized, 6 x 120 m3/h, steel ducts, with earth tube heat exchanger | ventilation of dwellings, decentralized, 6 x 120 m3/h | EN15804GD, U
Category: F:Construction/43:Specialized construction activities/432:Electrical, plumbing and other construction installation activities/4322:Plumbing, heat and air-conditioning installation
Description: Electricity demand of ventilator (0.4 Wh/m3) representative for DC- or EC-motors and a system design with low pressure drops. Electricity demand of control unit 10 W. Decentral ventilation system including 4 parallel polyethylene ground heat exchanger tubes (200 mm diameter). Air distribution to the 6 decentral ventilation units with a galvanised steel tube (400 mm diameter). Distribution of fresh- and exhaust-air within the flat with galvanised steel ducts (100x50 mm). Exhaust air from the 6 decentral ventilation units with a galvanised steel tube (400 mm diameter) to the exhaust on the roof.
